ISSUE.TITLE: Ensure consistent `usage` error style
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Some commands display an error followed by the help message when using a sub-command wrong, and others just display the error. We should switch to a hybrid, where we say: ``` > Error! Incorrect number of parameters supplied > Usage: now alias add <from> <to> > For further help and examples, run `now help alias` ```
